articles.title: Canada: Global AIDS conference kicks off amid fury over visas - DW (English)
articles.description: Canada is hosting this year's International AIDS Conference. The event has been billed as a chance for "the world to come together." However, visa issues are causing frustration for would-be attendees from Africa.

articles.title: Africa's 'silent epidemic': More than 90 million people have hepatitis - WHO sounds alarm - News24
articles.description: Although a nearly 100% effective vaccine is readily available, hepatitis B and C are still regarded as Africa's "silent pandemic", with more than 90 million people on the continent suffering from hepatitis.

• Hepatitis B and C cause liver cirrhosis and cancer and has been described as Africa's "silent pandemic".
